CQ1.query: List all course names along with their credits and the capacity of the rooms they are scheduled in for the Spring semester of 2024.
CQ1.sql: SELECT c.title, c.credits, cl.capacity FROM course c JOIN section s ON c.title = s.course_title JOIN classroom cl ON s.building = cl.building AND s.room_number = cl.room_number WHERE s.semester = 'Spring' AND s.year = 2024;

CQ2.query: Determine which courses from the 'Computer Science' department are offered in rooms with more than 50 seats during the Fall 2023 semester.
CQ2.sql: SELECT c.title, cl.capacity FROM course c JOIN section s ON c.title = s.course_title JOIN classroom cl ON s.building = cl.building AND s.room_number = cl.room_number WHERE c.dept_name = 'Computer Science' AND cl.capacity > 50 AND s.semester = 'Fall' AND s.year = 2023;
